,50,250,125,50,255,25,254/,250,250,200,50,255,25,254/,500,250,200,50,255,25,254/,50,350,125,50,255,25,254/,250,350,200,50,255,25,254/,500,350,200,50,255,25,254/,50,450,125,50,255,25,254/,250,450,200,50,255,25,254/,500,450,200,50,255,25,254/,50,550,125,50,255,25,254/,250,550,200,50,255,25,254/,500,550,200,50,255,25,254
GO BACK,650,0,100,50,255,24,255
GO BACK,650,0,100,50,255,24,255/GAME RULE,200,200,200,50,255,30,255/HOW TO PLAY,650,200,200,50,255,30,255
,950,0,50,50,255,30,255
RESUME,400,250,200,50,0,30,255/QUICK HELP,410,350,200,50,0,30,255/QUIT,410,450,200,50,0,30,255
TO PAUSE,870,0,100,50,255,25,255
